text: Laildo Ribeiro Machado (born 10 October 1952) is a Brazilian rower. He competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Laildo Machado
